title: Locked and Unlocked camera
body: Im a support main and I've been playing league for about an year now.I unlock my camera when I want to get to a certain spot on the map or when I want to see where my opponent is standing, otherwise I usually leave it locked in team fights and in lanes.Should I start using my camera unlocked more often or stay as it is? I've been playing all right with my camera locked often.

replies.body: personally I spam between locked and unlocked, so that I'm less likely to get caught out or miss an ability, but also more likely to watch the map or prepare for the teamfight I'm charging into. Imo being one of those fully unlocked camera wizards doesn't really matter till you get to plat, since the minimap conveys alot of information already, and the rest can be seen with a quick flick of unlocked camera and then mouse over the target area.

As someone who uses locked Camera mostly, if it's what your used to and good with it's not a bad thing, you can actually be forced to have more awareness as a player with a locked camera because your using the map more to fill in the parts that you can't see.

Not only this, but the fact that you move it when you need to, makes it a good way to use the camera anyway.
